hero.h1: Stop Paying for AI Note Takers You Might Not Use
hero.tagline: Have you ever subscribed to an app only to realize it wasn't what you needed? We believe you shouldn't have to pay to find out if a service works.

pain.p1: It's a common story: You download a note taker app, hit a paywall immediately, and sign up for a trial that turns into a monthly charge. Then you realize the app doesn't quite fit your workflow.
pain.p2: We don't want that. We want you to be 100% convinced before you commit to a subscription.

philosophy.p1: Minutes.AI aims to be the best note taker for many, but we know we can't be perfect for everyone (100 out of 100 people).
philosophy.p2: That's why we offer these low-risk options. We only want you to subscribe when you are sure we are the right partner for your meetings.

seo.description: Tired of paying for apps before you know if they work? Minutes.AI offers a free daily ticket and non-expiring $1.99 packs so you can test our AI Note Taker risk-free.

ld.description: Minutes.AI provides a risk-free way to test AI note taking. Includes a daily free 3-minute ticket and low-cost non-expiring time packs.
